5df75cf16b05c.Name: LLPG - MYSERVICES - address postcode lookup
5df75cf16b05c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59c0a03ddebc1","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) AS display, uprn AS name,
sao AS flat,
pao AS house,
street_name AS street,
town_name AS town , 
county_name AS county,
postcode,
uprn,
ward,
lng,
lat,
locality_name AS locality,
usrn
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

591f0c47c72b0.Name: LLPG Firmstep
591f0c47c72b0.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59c0a03ddebc1","new_category":"LLPG","secure_fields_db_database":"","results_page_columns_db":"","lookup_validation":"0","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,
sao as flat,
pao as house,
street_name as street,
town_name as town , 
county_name as county,
postcode,
uprn,ward,lng,lat, locality_name as locality, usrn
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100"}

props.label: staticText 1
props.content: Please note: You must provide online payment for this licence after completing the form. After clicking the submit button at the end of the form you will be taken to our secure online payment website. You can then make the required payment using either a credit or debit card.

Reasons why you cannot return the premises licence or relevant part of premises licence

props.validationMaskMessage: Please input text of the format: _validation_mask_

props.label: staticText 9
props.content:
To complete the application you must supply the following original document(s):

The consent form completed by the individual you wish to be premises supervisor.
The premises licence or the relevant part of the premises licence.

This should be sent by post to:
Licensing, Brentwood Borough Council, Town Hall, Ingrave Road, Brentwood, Essex CM15 8AY

Please include the reference number for this form, which will be produced when you submit it.

props.maximumChoicesMessage: Please select no more than _max_value_ choices
props.label: I will notify the existing premises supervisor (if any) of this application (please read guidance note 4)

props.maximumChoicesMessage: Please select no more than _max_value_ choices
props.label: I understand that if I do not comply with the above requirements my application will be rejected
staticText 10
props.content:
It is an offence, under Section 158 of the Licensing Act 2003, to knowingly or recklessly make a false statement in or in connection with this application. Those who make a false statement may be liable on summary conviction to a fine of any amount.

It is an offence under section 24B of the Immigration Act 1971 for a person to work when they know, or have reasonable cause to believe, that they are disqualified from doing so by reason of their immigration status.

Those who employ an adult without a valid leave to enter or remain in the UK or an adult who is subject to conditions which would prevent that person from taking up employment will be liable to a civil penalty under Section 15 of the Immigration, Asylum and Nationality Act 2006 and, pursuant to section 21 of the same act, will be committing an offence where they do so in the knowledge, or with reasonable cause to believe, that the employee is disqualified by virtue of their immigration status.

props.label: staticText 11
props.content: Part 3 - Signatures (please read guidance note 5)

props.label: staticText 15
props.content:
Payment

There is standard, non-refundable fee of £23.00 for an application to vary a premises licence to specify an individual as a designated premises supervisor.
